title: Prepare Return with Foreign Bank Account Reporting (FBAR)
description: A U.S. resident has financial accounts in a foreign country and needs to file an FBAR (FinCEN Form 114).

tasks.description: Gather information on all foreign financial accounts, including the maximum value of each account during the year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary foreign account data.

tasks.description: Determine if the aggregate value of the accounts exceeded the $10,000 filing threshold.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that an FBAR filing is required.

tasks.description: Electronically file the FBAR with the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN) by the deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully completes the separate FBAR filing.
